caption: This photograph captures a serene and somewhat hazy marine scene. Dominating the frame, the vast, calm expanse of the sea in varying shades of blue sets a tranquil tone. A noticeable aspect of the composition is a ship, depicted on the right side of the frame, sailing on the sea. The ship appears to be a medium-sized cargo or fishing vessel, and it is creating a noticeable wake as it moves through the water. This wake forms a curved white line on the surface of the water, trailing behind the vessel and adding a dynamic element to the otherwise still waters. The color palette of the scene is mostly a blend of blues and muted tones, suggesting this scene could be either during early morning or late afternoon, with a slightly overcast sky contributing to the subdued lighting.
title: In the distance, a New York city sludge carrier dumps its cargo into waters of the New York bight.  The u.s.  Coast guard is responsible for monitoring all ocean dumping in the bight which includes 15,000 square miles of ocean waters and the continental shelf off the coasts of New York and New Jersey.  The national oceanographic and atmospheric administration is conducting a marine ecosystems analysis program in the bight.  The multi-year project is being observed by epa and the coast guard
